text: Gianpaolo Bissi (2 May 1941 â€“ 23 June 2022) was an Italian politician. He was a member of the Italian Democratic Socialist Party. He was in the Senate of the Republic from 1987 to 1992. Bissi was born in Teglio, Italy. Bissi died in Teglio on 23 June 2022 at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Lombardy
title: Gianpaolo Bissi
